RelatedSentence: Simmons , Jordan , Dowdy and the others who died last year -- we do n't even know all the names yet --  are a sobering reminder of the danger of some jobs in Wyoming .
This annual accounting means it 's time to evaluate our progress on worker safety and see what we should do next .

That 's why we call on lawmakers to use this summer to step up , call for an accounting of progress on worker safety , and hash out a legislative plan that aggressively pushes the state and its most dangerous industries forward to build a culture of safety in the state .

That 's why we call on lawmakers to use this summer to step up , call for an accounting of progress on worker safety , and hash out a legislative plan that aggressively pushes the state and its most dangerous industries forward to build a culture of safety in the state .

We call on the Legislature , specifically the Joint Minerals , Business and Economic Development Committee , to restart the conversation about substantive ways to improve and assess the safety of workers in the state .
Recent years have brought some positive steps , with new worker safety initiatives in effect .

There 's a safety group comprised of the state 's refiners -- a much - needed conversation between refiners who in 2012 faced more safety violations per barrel than refiners in any other state , according to a Star - Tribune analysis .

On the state side , there 's state workplace epidemiologist Mack Sewell , who in his role as a safety champion serves as a new center - point of workplace safety and death data , the analysis of which will pay dividends for policymakers , particularly when a hard count of those who have died lags so far behind the present day .

On the state side , there 's state workplace epidemiologist Mack Sewell , who in his role as a safety champion serves as a new center - point of workplace safety and death data , the analysis of which will pay dividends for policymakers , particularly when a hard count of those who have died lags so far behind the present day .

In recent years , the state added to its ranks of work safety inspectors , although their numbers are still very thin , and the state put together a grant program to help companies out with safety measures .

Let 's restart the conversation about worker safety -- where we 're at , and where we should be .
The 35 workers who died in 2012 bear witness we 've got a way to go .

The deadbeat servants of wealth in the legislature need to quit selling out to the Chamber of Commerce and start acknowledging the suckers who voted for them and pass worker safety laws that mean something ...
